title: Desire
brief_description: This clever, noirish comedy is shot in black and white without dialogue by the director of Australian hit movies Love and Other Catastrophes (1996) and Strange Planet. (1999) A lonely laboratory worker becomes obsessed with a woman on a train - with deadly consequences.
